authors: Fabian D., Martin P., Simon B., Scott S.
instructions: You can roll skills directly from the sheet, by clicking on the corresponding name or the roll button at the beginning of the row.

useroptions.description: Legacy is the old sheet method, Prompt asks every roll for normal/boon/bane, Toggle displays Normal/Boon/Bane buttons.
Yes prompts for a modifier on every roll, No never prompts for a modifier, Toggle displays Yes/No buttons.
